data.text: @JohnKarter01 @argounova Yep.  It suspended me 3 times for posting facts also
@ReadAloudToMe @JohnKarter01 Integration is a different point. You are introducing genetic material so that your cells express something they don’t have.  That’s gene therapy.

@Superspreader16 @JohnKarter01 Hmm, from my biology understanding the mRNA will be completely gone within a few days, as it has a half-life of ten hours & the protein completely gone after (at most) a few weeks. Could you comment/reconcile when we know the mRNA in RNA vaccines cannot alter or integrate w/ DNA?
@JohnKarter01 That happens when you post nonesense mate.
@JohnKarter01 As a biologist who has worked on human genetic disease, I can confirm it is gene therapy.
